title: SB 1.19.23 | HH Stoka Krishna Swami | 26-05-2023 | Daily Evening Bhagavatam Discourse
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.key_quote: Om Agyana Timiraandhasya Gyananjanishalakaya Chaksharunmeelitam Jena Tasmai Shri Gurave Namaha
segments.summary: The lecture begins with traditional Vaishnava prayers and mantras.

segments.key_quote: O great sages, you have all very kindly assembled here, having come from all parts of the universe.
segments.summary: The speaker introduces and translates verse 23 from the 19th chapter of the 1st canto of Srimad Bhagavatam, focusing on Parikshit Maharaj's glorification of the assembled sages.

segments.key_quote: Bhagavan Sri Krishna is full of six kinds of opulences Aishwarya
segments.summary: The speaker elaborates on why Parikshit is glorifying the sages, emphasizing their selfless welfare activities and then explaining the six opulences of Bhagavan, referencing Srila Prabhupada's purport.

segments.key_quote: The sum total of all wealth belongs to Krishna
segments.summary: The speaker continues to describe the opulences of Krishna and compares them to the limited opulences of living entities, mentioning the 78% figure from the scriptures.

segments.key_quote: The supreme personality of godhead has got unlimited qualities but among those qualities the important qualities the principal qualities are counted as 64.
segments.summary: The speaker explains the 78% figure by comparing the 64 qualities of Krishna to the 50 qualities of living entities, and how material energy covers these attributes.

segments.key_quote: Just like the sun is covered by a cloud...similarly the original glare is pushed toward the...
segments.summary: The speaker uses the analogy of the sun being covered by a cloud to illustrate how material energy covers the original spiritual form and effulgence of living entities.

segments.key_quote: In Satyaloka that is Brahma's own planet planet where Brahma resides Satyaloka the inhabitants are fully cognizant of Vedic wisdom and thus the mystic cloud of material energy is cleared
segments.summary: The speaker describes the different planetary systems, focusing on Satyaloka and how Vedic wisdom clears the material energy, leading to liberation.

segments.key_quote: The Supreme Lord sends his confidential devotees to this material world to preach Krishna consciousness, God consciousness and to take back those souls who are agreeable to live in the spiritual world with the
segments.summary: The speaker discusses the desirelessness of devotees and why liberated souls descend to the material world to deliver fallen souls and preach Krishna consciousness.

segments.key_quote: These great saintly persons they have nothing to do in this world save and accept reclaim the fallen souls rotting in material existence deluded by material nature this is their only work
segments.summary: The speaker concludes by emphasizing the sole purpose of saintly persons: to reclaim fallen souls from material existence, regardless of different climatic influences.
